26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_pci_g84.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:34 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "priv.h"
30
31#include <core/pci.h>
32
33void
34g84_pci_init(struct nvkm_pci *pci)
35{
36 /* The following only concerns PCIe cards. */
37 if (!pci_is_pcie(pci->pdev))
38 return;
39
40 /* Tag field is 8-bit long, regardless of EXT_TAG.
41 * However, if EXT_TAG is disabled, only the lower 5 bits of the tag
42 * field should be used, limiting the number of request to 32.
43 *
44 * Apparently, 0x041c stores some limit on the number of requests
45 * possible, so if EXT_TAG is disabled, limit that requests number to
46 * 32
47 *
48 * Fixes fdo#86537
49 */
50 if (nvkm_pci_rd32(pci, 0x007c) & 0x00000020)
51 nvkm_pci_mask(pci, 0x0080, 0x00000100, 0x00000100);
52 else
53 nvkm_pci_mask(pci, 0x041c, 0x00000060, 0x00000000);
54}
55
56static const struct nvkm_pci_func
57g84_pci_func = {
58 .init = g84_pci_init,
59 .rd32 = nv40_pci_rd32,
60 .wr08 = nv40_pci_wr08,
61 .wr32 = nv40_pci_wr32,
62 .msi_rearm = nv46_pci_msi_rearm,
63};
64
65int
66g84_pci_new(struct nvkm_device *device, int index, struct nvkm_pci **ppci)
67{
68 return nvkm_pci_new_(&g84_pci_func, device, index, ppci);
69}
70
